document.full_text: french finance minister christine lagarde has proposed visiting china in early june and will meet leading officials from the people's bank of china, china's foreign ministry said on thursday, a visit during which she would discuss her candidacy to head the international monetary fund.
document.title: china says lagarde proposes june visit
lines_and_colors: french finance minister christine lagarde has proposed visiting china in early june and will meet leading officials from the people's bank of china, china's foreign ministry said on thursday, a visit during which she would discuss her candidacy to head the international monetary fund.
